price: (Ànábì Mūsā) sọ pé: “Nítorí náà, máa lọ. Dájúdájú (ìjìyà) rẹ nílé ayé yìí ni kí o máa wí pé, “Má fi ara kàn mí”. Àti pé dájúdájú ọjọ́ ìyà kan ń bẹ fún ọ tí wọn kò níí gbé fò ọ́. Kí o sì wo ọlọ́hun rẹ, èyí tí o takú tì lọ́rùn tí ò ń bọ, dájúdájú a máa dáná sun ún. Lẹ́yìn náà, dájúdájú a máa ku eérú rẹ̀ dànù pátápátá sínú odò.
arabic: قَالَ فَٱذۡهَبۡ فَإِنَّ لَكَ فِي ٱلۡحَيَوٰةِ أَن تَقُولَ لَا مِسَاسَۖ وَإِنَّ لَكَ مَوۡعِدٗا لَّن تُخۡلَفَهُۥۖ وَٱنظُرۡ إِلَىٰٓ إِلَٰهِكَ ٱلَّذِي ظَلۡتَ عَلَيۡهِ عَاكِفٗاۖ لَّنُحَرِّقَنَّهُۥ ثُمَّ لَنَنسِفَنَّهُۥ فِي ٱلۡيَمِّ نَسۡفًا

version.title: Yoruba translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Yoruba by Abu Rahima Mikhail Aikweiny, printed in 1432 H.

meta.transliteration: qāla fa-idh'hab fa-inna laka fī al-ḥayati an taqūla lā misāsa wa-inna laka mawʿidan lan tukh'lafahu wa-unẓur ilā ilāhika alladhī ẓalta ʿalayhi ʿākifan lanuḥarriqannahu thumma lanansifannahu fī al-yami nasfan
